channel.title: 317 delta hp bar
channel.description: Hi, I was wondering if someone knew how to fix it so that monsters hp bar is accurate. When the hp bar gets to 0 it goes back up b/c it isn't displaying their hp correctly. I tried searching for a solution but didn't find one. (Also the base is delta) Thanks

item.title: 317 delta hp bar
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

nice help. but i dont know how to do that!

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta hp bar
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

It may be an error trying to send a negative value to the client through the hit update block. Make sure if the hit is higher than the monsters HP to set it to the monsters hp.

Read full topic
